lines.text: Volume per unit time remains the same

secText:
Lesson:
1. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_j378:Pascal's principle].
2. Determine how [OBJ:pwsec_j379:hydraulic lifts] work using Pascal's principle.
3. Define [OBJ:expsec_j380:fluid continuity].
4. Calculate [OBJ:expsec_5990:fluid continuity].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_35616:Calculate] the force acting on an object using Pascal's principle.
2. [OBJ:qc_34971:Calculate] the velocity of a fluid using the fluid continuity equation.
